events.message: I have filed a claim for the car accident that occurred last night at the intersection. The vehicle sustained heavy front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the review of the initial report and vehicle details.
An agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle collision claim to assist with further steps and communication.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been officially acknowledged and is now in process for evaluation.
Please submit your accident report, photos of vehicle damage, and the police report to proceed with the claim assessment.
All requested documents including the accident report, pictures, and police statement were submitted successfully.
The investigation into the circumstances and liability of the auto accident has officially started today.
Investigation finalized with a clear report supporting the claim with no discrepancies found.
A proposed settlement amount for the vehicle repairs and damages has been sent for your review and approval.
Customer has provided positive feedback on the communication and the proposed compensation offer.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved with all documents verified and settlement agreed upon.
The approved settlement payment has been processed and issued to your designated bank account today.
Your auto accident insurance claim has been closed successfully after settlement payment completion.
All documents and files related to your vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference.
